function function ODEsystem::ODEsystem (in name, in neqn, in ninv) ODEsystem ODEsystem::ODEsystem
in name
in neqn
in ninv
Class constructor for a system of ODEs that requires the following inputs:
name Name of the system of ODEs/DAEs;
neqn Number of equations of the system of ODEs/DAEs;
ninv Number of invariants/contraints of the system of ODEs/DAEs [optional, default = 0].

<<<<<<< Updated upstream:docs_build/sphinx/_doxygen/doc_matlab/xml-matlab/a00252.xml =======
(Abstract) Definition of the system of ODEs:
\[ \mathbf{x}' = \mathbf{f}( t, \mathbf{x} ) \quad\oplus\quad [\textrm{invariants}] \]
invariants are of the form:
\[ \mathbf{h}( t, \mathbf{x} ) = \mathbf{0} \]
The derived function must define the r.h.s. of the ODE $ \mathbf{f}( t, \mathbf{x} ) $ where $ \mathbf{x} $ are the states of the model described by the ODE.
function virtual function ODEsystem::DfDx (in this, in t, in x) DfDx ODEsystem::DfDx >>>>>>> Stashed changes:docs_build/sphinx/_doxygen/doc_matlab/xml-matlab/a00255.xml
in x_dot
in t
Definition of the system of ODEs:
\[ \mathbf{F}( \mathbf{x}, \mathbf{x}', t ) = \mathbf{0} \]
with optional invariants of the form:
\[ \mathbf{H}( \mathbf{x}, t ) = \mathbf{0} \]
The derived function must define an implicit system of ODEs of the form $ \mathbf{F}( \mathbf{x}, \mathbf{x}', t ) = \mathbf{0} $ where $ \mathbf{x} $ are the unknown functions of the independent variable $ \mathbf{t} $.

(Abstract) Evaluate the Jacobian of the hidden constraints of the system of ODEs:
\[ \partial \mathbf{h}( t, \mathbf{x} ) / \partial \mathbf{x} \]
Used only in projection method
function function Base::get_num_eqns (in this) get_num_eqns Base::get_num_eqns

>>>>>>> Stashed changes:docs_build/sphinx/_doxygen/doc_matlab/xml-matlab/a00255.xml
Evaluate the Jacobian of the of the system of ODEs:
\[ \dfrac{ \partial \mathbf{F}( \mathbf{x}, \mathbf{x}', t ) }{ \hat{\mathbf{x}} } \]
where $ \hat{\mathbf{x}} = \left[ \mathbf{x}, \mathbf{x}' \right]^T $ is the concatenation of the unknown functions and their derivatives.
